```lean4
import Mathlib

open Topology Filter

/--
A class with $2N$ students took a quiz, on which the possible scores were $0,1,\dots,10$. Each of these scores occurred at least once, and the average score was exactly $7.4$. Show that the class can be divided into two groups of $N$ students in such a way that the average score for each group was exactly $7.4$.
-/
theorem putnam_2017_a4
(N : ℕ)
(score : Fin (2 * N) → Fin 11)
(hsurj : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k)
(havg : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4)
: (∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4) :=
sorry

(N : ℕ)
(score : Fin (2 * N) → Fin 11)
(hsurj : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k)

theorem putnam_2017_a4
(N : ℕ)
(score : Fin (2 * N) → Fin 11)
(hsurj : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k)
(havg : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4)
: (∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4) := by
  have step₁ : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
    have h₁ : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k := hsurj
    have h₂ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4 := havg
    have h₃ : ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) = 7.4 * (2 * N) := by
      field_simp at h₂ ⊢
      <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
    have h₄ : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
      use Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩)
      have h₅ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) = 7.4 * (2 * N) := by linarith
      have h₆ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
        have h₇ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ)) = 7.4 * N := by
          have h₈ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
          have h₉ : ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) = 7.4 * (2 * N) := by linarith
          have h₁₀ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ) = ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) - ∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (⟨N, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨2 * N - 1, by omega⟩)), (score i : ℝ) := by
            rw [← Finset.sum_sdiff (Finset.Icc_subset_Iio (⟨N, by omega⟩))]
            simp [Finset.Iio_eq_Icc]
            <;> aesop
          simp_all [Finset.sum_fin_eq_sum_range]
          <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
        field_simp [h₇] <;> ring_nf <;> norm_num <;> simp_all [mul_comm] <;> field_simp at * <;> nlinarith
      have h₇ : (∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩))ᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
        have h₈ : (∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩))ᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) = 7.4 * N := by
          have h₉ : ∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩))ᶜ, (score i : ℝ) = ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) - ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ) := by
            rw [← Finset.sum_sdiff (Finset.Icc_subset_Iio (⟨N, by omega⟩))]

(N : ℕ)

: (∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4) := by
  have step1 : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
    have h₁ : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k := hsurj
    have h₂ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4 := havg
    have h₃ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) = 7.4 * (2 * N) := by
      field_simp at h₂ ⊢
      <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
    have h₄ : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
      use Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩)
      have h₅ : (Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩)).card = N := by
        simp [Finset.Icc_eq_empty, Nat.sub_add_cancel, Nat.succ_le_iff]
        <;> omega
      have h₆ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
        have h₇ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ)) = 7.4 * N := by
          have h₈ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨0, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ) = ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) - ∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (⟨N, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨2 * N - 1, by omega⟩)), (score i : ℝ) := by

              simp [Finset.mem_union, Finset.mem_Icc, Nat.lt_succ_iff]

          have h₉ : ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨N, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨2 * N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ) = ∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (⟨N, by omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨2 * N - 1, by omega⟩), (score i : ℝ) := rfl

(hsurj : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k)
(havg : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4)
: (∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4) := by
  have step : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
    have h₁ : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k := hsurj
    have h₂ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4 := havg
    have h₃ : ∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ) = 7.4 * (2 * N) := by
      have h₄ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4 := havg
      field_simp at h₄ ⊢
      <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
    have h₄ : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
      -- Use the fact that the average score is 7.4 to find a subset of size N that also has an average of 7.4
      use Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⊤)
      simp_all [Finset.sum_fin_eq_sum_range, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.card_fin]
      <;> ring_nf at * <;>
        field_simp at * <;>
        norm_cast at * <;>
        (try omega) <;>
        (try ring_nf at *) <;>
        (try norm_cast at *) <;>
        (try aesop)
      <;>
        nlinarith
    exact h₄
  
  exact step

```lean4
theorem putnam_2017_a4
(N : ℕ)
(score : Fin (2 * N) → Fin 11)
(hsurj : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k)
(havg : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4)
: (∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ k : Fin 11, ∃ i : Fin (2 * N), score i = k := hsurj
  have h₂ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) / (2 * N) = 7.4 := havg
  have h₃ : ∃ s : Finset (Fin (2 * N)), s.card = N ∧ (∑ i ∈ s, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 ∧ (∑ i ∈ sᶜ, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
    -- We use the fact that the average score is 7.4 to find a subset of size N with the same average.
    use Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
      have h₄ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
      omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N))
    have h₄ : (Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
      have h₅ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
      omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N))).card = N := by
      simp [Finset.Icc_eq_empty, Nat.sub_add_cancel]
      <;> omega
    have h₅ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
      have h₆ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
      omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)), (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
      have h₆ : (∑ i ∈ Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
        have h₇ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
        omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N)), (score i : ℝ)) = N * 7.4 := by
        have h₇ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) = N * 7.4 := by
          field_simp [h₂] at *
          <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
        simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top]
        <;> aesop
      field_simp [h₄] at *
      <;> nlinarith
    have h₆ : (∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
      have h₇ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
      omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N))).compl, (score i : ℝ)) / N = 7.4 := by
      have h₇ : (∑ i ∈ (Finset.Icc (0 : Fin (2 * N)) (⟨N - 1, by
        have h₈ : N ≤ 2 * N := by omega
        omega⟩ : Fin (2 * N))).compl, (score i : ℝ)) = N * 7.4 := by
        have h₈ : (∑ i : Fin (2 * N), (score i : ℝ)) = N * 7.4 := by
          field_simp [h₂] at *
          <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith
        simp_all [Finset.sum_Icc_succ_top, Finset.compl_Icc]
        <;> aesop
      field_simp [h₄] at *
      <;> nlinarith
    exact ⟨h₄, h₅, h₆⟩
  exact h₃
